SEARCH
Package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.examples.support

Class BitstreamOptionParser

java.lang.Object
joptsimple.OptionParser
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.examples.support.BitstreamOptionParser
public class BitstreamOptionParser extends joptsimple.OptionParser
Provides a number of handy argument parsing and help functions for bitstream related executables.

    • checkHelpOptionExitOnHelpMessage

      public void checkHelpOptionExitOnHelpMessage(joptsimple.OptionSet options)
      This method will look to see if the HELP_OPTION is specified. If it is, it will exit and print the argument usage of the executable.

    • parseRequiredBitstreamFromOptionsExitOnError

      public Bitstream parseRequiredBitstreamFromOptionsExitOnError(joptsimple.OptionSet options, String bitstreamOption, boolean printResultMessage)
      Determine the filename of a bitstream from an option that requires a parameter, parse the bitstream, and return the bitstream. Exit if there is any error along the way.

    • parseOptionalBitstreamFromOptionsExitOnError

      public Bitstream parseOptionalBitstreamFromOptionsExitOnError(joptsimple.OptionSet options, String bitstreamOption, boolean printResultMessage)

    • getPartInfoExitOnError

      public XilinxConfigurationSpecification getPartInfoExitOnError(joptsimple.OptionSet options, Bitstream bitstream, boolean printMessage)
      Extract the part information from the bitstream. If it is not available in the bitstream, extract it from the command line options.

    • getRequiredPartInfoExitOnError

      public XilinxConfigurationSpecification getRequiredPartInfoExitOnError(joptsimple.OptionSet options)

    • printUsage

      public void printUsage()
      Print the 'Usage' of the executable. If there is a help string, print it. If not, print the default option parser "printHelpOn" message.

    • printUsageAndExit

      public void printUsageAndExit()
      Print the usage of the executable and exit.
